title: cmd/gc: error on wrong line due to file not ending in newline
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

go build

What is the expected output?

./b.go:3: missing return at end of function

What do you see instead?

./c.go:1: missing return at end of function

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g

Which operating system are you using?

linux

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

go version devel +bbe324079abe Tue May 07 11:41:36 2013 -0700 linux/amd64

Please provide any additional information below.

$ md5sum *.go
ee4dd40078e20f39ca715e81a2230abd  a.go
fa2efc3ab64bc26135c8fb0c894ab437  b.go
ee4dd40078e20f39ca715e81a2230abd  c.go

b.go doesn't end with a newline
Attachments: 1. a.go (14 bytes) 1. b.go (37 bytes) 1. c.go (14 bytes)
